channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18426] Memory leak in RoutingAppender for every hive operation
item.description: Each new operation creates new entry in the ConcurrentMap in RoutingAppender but when the operation ends, AppenderControl stored in the map is retrieved and stopped but the entry in ConcurrentMap is never cleaned up.
item.summary: Memory leak in RoutingAppender for every hive operation

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attached patch makes sure that entries in ConcurrentMap are removed when the operation is cleaned-up
Updated new patch which has code changes to verify the new code changes.

+1 overall
